en: [b]MIDI Flattener[/b] allows you to standardize MIDI files by setting fixed tempo and time signature values while preserving all note and event timestamps. This process eliminates the complications caused by tempo and time signature changes, making the files compatible with applications that require consistent timing throughout the composition.
zh: [b]MIDI Flattener[/b] 允许您通过设置固定的速度和拍号值来标准化 MIDI 文件，同时保留所有音符和事件的时间戳。此过程消除了由速度和拍号变化引起的复杂性，使文件与需要在整个作品中保持一致时序的应用程序兼容。

en:
[b]Guide[/b]
1. Configure the [b][i]target tempo[/i][/b] and [b][i]target time signature[/i][/b] for the final output MIDI file
2. Click [b][i]Add MIDI File[/i][/b] or drag the MIDI file you want to convert into the application window
3. Click the [b][i]Run Convert[/i][/b] button, and the converted file will be saved in the source MIDI file's directory with the extension [b][i]*.flattened.mid[/i][/b]
zh:
[b]使用指南[/b]
1. 配置最终输出的MIDI文件的 [b][i]目标速度[/i][/b] 以及 [b][i]目标拍号[/i][/b]
2. 点击 [b][i]添加MIDI文件[/i][/b] 或将需要转换的MIDI文件拖动到应用程序窗口中
3. 点击 [b][i]运行转换[/i][/b] 按钮，转换后的文件会以  [b][i]*.flattened.mid[/i][/b] 的扩展名被保存于各个MIDI源文件的目录中

en: An error occurred while converting the MIDI file. Please check and report the following error message\n<ErrorMessage>
zh: 转换MIDI文件时发生错误。请检查并报告以下错误信息\n<ErrorMessage>
<Time> - 转换了 <Amount> 个 MIDI 文件
